snippet.textDisplay: I am donating to your GoFundMe, because I really do want you to get to go to Virginia and cover this case! It's very educational for everyone. We are all learning so much about peaceful protesting from you and how to document important events. What you have done so far is priceless! Please do not stop now. You only just opened the fundraiser, please give it time.

snippet.textDisplay: #justiceforjohnny We love you Johnny! Hang in there! I always tell my other half "things will get better, we just have to try not to stress to much" shortly after things start looking up. 🙏❤
